sn13.11:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso sinerussa pabbatarajassa satta muggamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhipeyya.
sn13.11:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram, ya va satta muggamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhitta yo va sineru pabbataraja”ti?
sn13.11:2.3: Neva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti sinerum pabbatarajanam upanidhaya satta muggamattiyo pasanasakkhara upanikkhitta”ti.
sn13.11:3.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa ditthisampannassa puggalassa adhigamam upanidhaya annatitthiyasamanabrahmanaparibbajakanam adhigamo neva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na satasahassimam kalam upeti.
sn13.11:3.2: Evam mahadhigamo, bhikkhave, ditthisampanno puggalo, evam mahabhinno”ti.
